name: Verified Reviews
headline: Integrate Verified Reviews software with your VTEX ecommerce store.
overview: Specializing in the multichannel (online/offline) collection of customer reviews, Verified Reviews allows the measurement and analysis of customer satisfaction. Our multi-tool platform offers both management and monitoring of all your content, as well as handling its diffusion. Verified Reviews is present in more than 20 countries and supports more than 20,000 stores such as Aubade and Lapeyre.
features: Collect product, brand and store reviews
Enrich product pages with reviews and star ratings
Monitor and improve the customer experience
Automation of brand and consumer relations
additionalInformation: To use this service, you must have an active account on the Verified Reviews platform. Click on the link below and register: https://www.netreviews.com/en/sign-up/.
